sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text: This Act may be cited as the Illinois Youthbuild Act.

sections.text: The purpose of the Illinois Youthbuild Act is:

sections.heading: Selection criteria. Priority in the awarding of funds
sections.text:
under this Act shall be given to applicants with experience in operating
Youthbuild programs.
Organizations claiming to have operated Youthbuild programs must be licensed
by Youthbuild USA or be organizations that have received federal
Youthbuild funding.

sections.heading: Eligible entities. Those eligible to be awarded funds under
sections.text:
this Act are not-for-profit private agencies, or public agencies with
experience operating a Youthbuild program or
with a plan to incubate a Youthbuild program until it can be established as a
program applicant.
